With the mission’s objective in mind—locating the stolen encrypted drives—each commando split off the main group, hiding in the shadows, blending into the dimly lit hallways and office rooms. ThisSector 9 was filled with stealth, each commando a shadow themselves amidst the walls and machinery.

The thick air hummed with tension. Time was of the essence; every tick of the clock resonated in their minds. Suddenly, a faint glow flickered from the end of the hall—it was a laptop on a workspace.

The commando who spotted itανου motioned urgently, leading his teammate therein a strategic retreat. As they approached, the laptop was their lifeline—a direct path to the stolen data. Carefully, they connected a USB drive, waiting with bated breaths as the files began their transfer.

A distant noise echoed, shaking the calm. Heavy footsteps echoed through the halls, coming straight towards them. The commandos knew the drill; they swiftly packed their gear, ready for evacuation.

With the data secured, the team blended into the darkness, melting away from the potential threat. Smoothly, they retreated from the warehouse, back into the cloak of night, leaving no trace of their presence behind.

As they neared their extraction point, a silent chill ran through them—all had gone successfully. In the night's embrace, they were already gone, vanished like phantoms back into the vast expanse ofSector 9, each commando knowing they had triumphed in the dead of night.

response:
once upon a time, there was a young girl named zest who wanted to learn how to ride a bike. she had watched many children zooming around on their bicycles, their faces filled with joy and the wind in their hair. zest was determined to do the same.

her dad, ramsey, was always supportive. "don't worry, zest," he would say, "we'll practice each day until you are comfortable riding." they chose a quiet path right by their house, where only a few people passed by, giving zest plenty of space to try her new skill.

ramsey explained to zest how to hold the handlebars tightly, keep her feet on the pedals, and use her balance to stay upright. zest nodded, determined to understand every detail. 

the first day was tricky. zest had wheels instead of feet, and balance was harder than it seemed. she wobbled, she fell, and her bottom scraped the ground a bit. "it's okay, zest," ramsey said with a smile whenever she got up. "the earth is soft, and practice makes perfect."

day after day, zest came back to the path, digressing her heart out. each time was a little better than the last. slowly, she mastered the rhythm of pedaling and concentrated on maintaining her balance.

one morning, as the sun glistened through the trees, zest's dad set her heart racing. "okay, zest, today's the day!"

ramsey steadied zest slightly, "remember to trust yourself. you got this!"

with a deep breath, zest pushed down and started pedaling confidently. For the first time, she wasn't wobbling; she was riding. joy washed over her, the parade in her head suddenly gone. the breeze brushed her cheeks, and she felt free.

"i did it!" zest exclaimed, her eyes sparkling, her face flushed with happiness.

"you sure did, zest," ramsey said proudly, his eyes twinkling. "and see, practice makes perfect, just like they said."

from that day on, zest rode her bike everywhere, the horizon open wide with possibilities. she learned not just to ride a bike, but that with patience, persistence, and a little help from loved ones, she could achieve anything she set her mind to. the end.

response:
Once upon a time, in the small town of Willow Creek, there lived a young girl named Elara. She had always dreamed of zooming around on her very own bicycle, just like her big brother, Jonah. One sunny morning, Jonah brought home a shiny red bicycle with a big bow tied to it. It was Elara's gift, and she couldn't wait to learn how to ride it.

Jonah smiled and said, "Don't worry, Elara. I'll teach you everything I know. Riding a bike takes practice, but with patience, you'll be cruising in no time!"

The first day was tough. Jonah held onto the back of the bike while Elara sat on the seat, her heart racing. "Pedal, pedal," Jonah encouraged gently as Elara tried her best. At first, the bike tilted, and Elara wobbled. She giggled each time she fell into Jonah's arms. "Don't worry, it's okay," Jonah said with a smile. "Every try gets you closer to riding all by yourself!"

By the third day, Elara was getting more comfortable. Jonah gave her a little push, and she pedaled all by herself for a few seconds before wobbling again. But each time she tried, Jonah was there, helping her up, adjusting her balance, and offering encouraging words.

One afternoon, as the sun began to set, Jonah suggested, "Let's find an open field for a little practice." The soft grass was perfect for Elara's new wheels. Jonah held her securely, and then, slowly letting go of the bike, he said, "Go ahead! Try it all yourself." 

This time, when Jonah let go, something magic happened. Elara felt the balance and rhythm of her pedals. She rode a few feet without even realizing it, her heart singing with joy. Jonah whistled happily from behind her.

From that day on, every sunny afternoon, Elara practiced and practiced until she could ride her bike wherever she wanted, feeling free and proud. "Thank you, Jonah," Elara said with a grin, knowing she'd never forget his patient guidance and support. 

And so, in Willow Creek, Elara became the little girl with the fearless spirit and the love for adventure, riding her bike with confidence and cheer.

response:
Once upon a time, in the small town of Willow Creek, there lived a young girl named Emma. Emma had always admired her older brother, Jake, zipping around the neighborhood on his shiny blue bike. She dreamed of the day she would be able to ride as confidently as he did.

One sunny morning, Emma's mom surprised her with a tiny bike, painted in her favorite color, pink. "It's time to learn how to ride!" her mom exclaimed. Emma couldn't wait. With her mom and dad right behind her, encouraging her, Emma started her learning journey.

The first attempt wasn't so successful. Emma wobbled and tilted, her heart racing as she held tightly to the garden fence. But she didn't give up. Each day, she practiced with her family's support. They helped her learn the balance and the rhythm of pedaling.

Jake, who had once felt nervous learning to ride, now became Emma's teacher. He showed her how to look ahead, find her balance, and trust her instincts. "Remember, fall is part of learning," Jake assured her with a smile.

One breezy afternoon, Emma decided to try a little farther from home. Her heart thrummed as she approached the park. Her family watched from the distance, knowing it was time for her to fly solo.

Taking a deep breath, Emma climbed onto her bike. She focused on the horizon and pedaled gently. At first, she wobbled, but with each try, she felt a little more stable. Gradually, she gained confidence.

Suddenly, a gentle breeze blew by, and Emma felt the weight of her doubts lift. Her legs found their rhythm, and she was riding! Her family cheered as she zoomed past them, the wind whispering secrets in her ears.

With a joyful grin, Emma returned to her family, knowing she had achieved something special. Riding a bike was not just about balancing on wheels; it was about growing up and discovering who you could become.

And so, Emma rode her bike happily through the lanes of Willow Creek, the echoes of her laughter blending with the setting sun, as she started a journey full of adventure and limitless possibilities.

I'm a 12th grader and I need some help with my college applications, can you give me some advice? Your entire response should be in English language, no other language is allowed.

response:
Bien sûr ! Il est important de commencer votre processus de candidature au college bien à l'avance pour vous assurer d'avoir suffisamment pour satisfaire les échéances. Faites une recherche approfondie sur les colleges qui vous intéressent et prenez note de leurs exigences d'admission, telles que les notes, les tests exigés et les dates limites.

Lorsqu'il s'agit des notes, concentrez-vous à maintenir une bonne moyenne générale. Éloigner-vous un peu dans de multiples directions ne servira pas votre candidature. Par ailleurs, n'oubliez pas de rédiger un bon essai de motivation. Il offre aux admissaires une perspective plus personnelle sur qui vous êtes, vos rêves, et bien entendu, pourquoi vous êtes intéressé par leur institution particulière.

Assurez-vous aussi de remplir avec attention votre formulaire de demande en ligne et de le soumettre avant la date conforme aux exigences des colleges. La présentation physique et l'entretien (si applicable) sont également importantes étapes et devraient être préméditées avec soin pour vous présenter de votre meilleur côté. 

In addition, ne sous-estimez pas l'importance de la recommandation des professeurs. Demandez-leur que vous recommandent avec anticipation, afin de leur donner le temps nécessaire pour rédiger des lettres de recommandation éloquentes et pertinentes. 

Enfin, alors que vous considérez toutes ces étapes, rappelizez-vous à vous même de prendre un temps pour réviser chaque aspect de votre demande avec attention afin d'assurer que tout est aussi précis et intact possible. Bonne chance avec votre demande d’entrée au college !

input_data.content: I'm a 12th grader and I need some help with my college applications, can you give me some advice? Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.
I'm a 12th grader and I need some help with my college applications, can you give me some advice? Your entire response should be in English, and in all capital letters.

response:
sure! here are some tips to help you with your college applications:

1. **Start Early**: Begin the application process well ahead of deadlines. This gives you enough time to write and revise your essays, gather reference letters, and ensure everything is submitted on time.

2. **Research Colleges**: Look into various colleges to find the best fit for you. Consider factors like the programs offered, location, size of the student body, and campus culture. It’s important to find a school that aligns with your interests and goals.

3. **Understand the Requirements**: Each college has its own set of requirements. Make sure you understand what is asked on the application forms, including essay prompts, standardized test scores, and reference letters. Tailor your application materials to each college where applicable.

4. **Write Strong Essays**: Your personal statement or essay is your chance to showcase your personality and experiences. Be genuine, stoiy your unique voice, and highlight what makes you special. Be sure to proofread and ask for feedback before submission.

5. **Secure Reference Letters**: Approach your teachers or mentors for reference letters who know you well and can speak to your strengths. Provide them with information about your achievements and goals to help them write a more personal letter.

6. **Prepare for Interviews**: Some colleges require interviews as part of their application process. Practice common questions and think of questions you might want to ask the interviewer about the college.

7. **Stay Organized**: Keep a checklist of all deadlines and requirements for each application. Use a planner or digital tool to keep track and make sure you aren't missing anything important.

8. **Request Feedback**: After submitting your applications, consider asking for feedback from teachers or college counseling officers. This can give you insights on areas to improve and help with future applications.

By following these tips, you can manage the college application process effectively and increase your chances of getting into the colleges of your choice. Good luck!

input_data.content: Write a rubric for evaluating a musical composition. Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.
Write a rubric for evaluating a musical composition. Your entire response should be in English language, no other language is allowed.

response:
Rubrique d'évaluation d'une composition musicale

### 1. Thème et Motivité
- **ligeur**: Comment pertinence et originalité du thème ?
 - 5 : Excellent – Un thème bien développé et originalisé.
 - 4 : Bon – Un thème perceptible et interessant.
 - 3 : Satisfaisant – Thème commun mais adapté celleóstère.
 - 2 : Insuffisant - Thème lâche ou sans intérêt.
 - 1 : Deficient – Aucune thème ou idée originale.

### 2. Rythme et Mélodie
- **clarté et complexité**: Quelle est la composition rythmique et mélodique ?
 - 5 : Excellent - Rythme et mélodie bien balancés et riches.
 - 4 : Bon – Rythme et mélodie ajustés avec bonne variété.
 - 3 : Satisfaisant – Facile à suivre mais Donnez peu d’innovation.
 - 2 : Insuffisant - Rythme ou mélodie trop laborieux ou pauvres.
 - 1 : Deficient – Mélodia & Rythme confus, artère difficileur seulement à suivre.

### 3. Harmonie et Structure
- **cohésion harmonique**: Comment est structurée l'œuvre ?
 - 5 : Excellent - Structure et progression harmoniques tabelurable et soparellamente attentive.
 - 4 : Bon – Harmonie et structure bien coordonnées.
 - 3 : Satisfaisant – Structure et armonies adéquates mais ordinaires.
 - 2 : Insuffisant - Structure et harmonie mal définies ou confusées.
 - 1 : Deficient – Structure et armonie peu apparumment cohérance avec l'œuvre entirmé.

### 4. Expressivité et Dynamisme
- **expression musicale**: La pièce démontre-elle une grande expressivité ?
 - 5 : Excellent – Expression riche et spontanément présente.
 - 4 : Bon – Variété dynamique attrayante.
 - 3 : Satisfaisant – Expression dynamise également suggestife mais peu ambitieux.
 - 2 : Insuffisant - Expression et dynamiques limitées.
 - 1 : Deficient – Resignation musicale, dynamiques pauvres et sans expression.

### 5. Présentation Globale
- **impact global**: Comment l'œuvre plaît-elle en fin d'analyse ?
 - 5 : Excellent – Impression globale très positive.
 - 4 : Bon – Impression générale positive mais faiblement confirmée.
 - 3 : Satisfaisant – Impresion globale faiblement positive.
 - 2 : Insuffisant - Impression globale négative.
 - 1 : Deficient – Impact sensible étrangement déficient ou desagréableur.

Une composition musicale est évaluée globalement en reliant ces critères pour obtenir une vision nuancée de son mérite artistique.

input_data.content: Write a rubric for evaluating a musical composition. Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.
Write a rubric for evaluating a musical composition. Your entire response should be in English, and in all capital letters.

response:
**musical composition evaluation rubric**

**1. creativity and originality (20%)**
- 20-18: demonstrates exceptional creativity and originality, presenting new ideas and concepts that enhance the overall piece.
- 17-15: shows good creativity, with some original ideas, but occasional reliance on familiar motifs.
- 14-12: average creativity, utilizing standard techniques with limited new elements.
- 11-10: lacks creativity, relying heavily on common tropes without significant innovation.
- 9 and below: little to no originality, with a strong reliance on clichés.

**2. structure and form (20%)**
- 20-18: exhibits a well-defined structure and a clear, logical form, effectively supporting the composition's intended style.
- 17-15: has a good sense of structure, but minor issues with coherence or consistency.
- 14-12: decent structure, with some confusion due to weak transitions or lack of clarity.
- 11-10: weakly structured, creating confusion or disruption.
- 9 and below: severely disorganized and lacking in form.

**3. melody (20%)**
- 20-18: exceptional melodic quality, featuring memorable, well-developed, and emotively rich lines.
- 17-15: strong and engaging melodies, though perhaps lacking in development or memorability.
- 14-12: average melodic presence, where some moments are weak or repetitive.
- 11-10: below average, with little to no impactful or memorable melodic element.
- 9 and below: melody is absent, weak, or completely ineffective.

**4. harmony and chord progression (20%)**
- 20-18: demonstrates advanced harmonic understanding, with sophisticated and appropriately used chord progressions.
- 17-15: solid use of harmony, with some advanced techniques, but occasional simplicity.
- 14-12: utilizes harmonic elements effectively without exceptional complexity or creativity.
- 11-10: average harmonic competence, with lapses in thinking and execution.
- 9 and below: significant harmonic issues, such as inappropriate use or confusion.

**5. rhythm and tempo (20%)**
- 20-18: exemplary control over rhythm and tempo, enhancing the piece's emotional and dynamic impact succinctly.
- 17-15: good rhythmic awareness, supporting the work well but occasionally wavering.
- 14-12: average rhythmic consistency and tempo agreement, occasionally leaving a disjointed feel.
- 11-10: troubles maintaining a consistent rhythm and appropriate tempo.
- 9 and below: significantly unpredictable or inconsistent in rhythm and tempo.

**overall score**
- 90-100: exceptional composition demonstrating strength in all categories.
- 80-89: very good, with minor areas needing improvement.
- 70-79: good effort, with notable areas requiring improvement.
- 60-69: satisfactory but lacking in several key aspects.
- below 60: needs significant revision and improvement across multiple categories.

input_data.content: Write a rubric for evaluating a musical composition. Do not include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.
Write a rubric for evaluating a musical composition. Include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.

response:
**Musical Composition Evaluation Rubric**

**1. Creativity and Originality (20 points)**
   - 18-20: The composition presents original and innovative ideas, demonstrating a high level of creativity.
   - 15-17: The work shows some originality, with elements that contribute to its uniqueness.
   - 10-14: Creativity is average; the composition relies on familiar patterns with limited new elements.
   - 5-9: Little originality is evident; the work heavily duplicates existing ideas.
   - 0-4: Composition lacks creativity; it is overly generic.

**2. Melody and Theme (20 points)**
   - 18-20: A well-developed theme with a compelling, memorable melody.
   - 15-17: A clear, recognizable theme and strong melodic presence.
   - 10-14: Theme and melody are decent but do not fully engage the listener.
   - 5-9: Weak or repetitive melodic elements detract from the composition.
   - 0-4: The melody is lost and fails to impress.

**3. Harmonies and Chord Progressions (20 points)**
   - 18-20: Harmonies are sophisticated, complementing the melody effectively.
   - 15-17: Chord progressions are appropriate and contribute positively to the feel.
   - 10-14: Harmonies and chord choices are average and do not significantly enhance the piece.
   - 5-9: Harmonies or chord progressions detract from the composition's quality.
   - 0-4: Harmonies and chords are poorly selected and disrupt the music.

**4. Rhythm and Structure (20 points)**
   - 18-20: Excellent rhythmic variety and a well-organized structure that keeps interest.
   - 15-17: A good balance of rhythmic elements and clear structural flow.
   - 10-14: Rhythmic variety is limited, or the structure feels disjointed.
   - 5-9: The rhythmic coherence is lacking, and the structure is confusing.
   - 0-4: Rhythm and structure are inconsistent and disruptive.

**5. Dynamics and Expression (20 points)**
   - 18-20: Excellent use of dynamics and expression, enhancing emotional impact.
   - 15-17: Dynamics and expressive qualities are well-judged and contribute effectively.
   - 10-14: Dynamics and expression are average, lacking in full impact.
   - 5-9: Dynamics and expression are underdeveloped, failing to engage fully.
   - 0-4: Dynamics are ineffective, and expressing emotional depth is impaired.

**Overall Score: /100**

Write notes or specific feedback for each section, providing detailed insights or suggestions for improvement.

input_data.content: Write a rubric for evaluating a musical composition. In your response, the word 'like' should appear less than 2 times.
Write a rubric for evaluating a musical composition. In your response, the word 'like' should appear at least 5 times.

response:
**Musical Composition Evaluation Rubric**

**1. Creativity and Originality (20 points)**
   - 18-20: Exceptional originality and creativity; the composition presents unique ideas and styles.
   - 15-17: Good originality; some distinctive features with minor generic markers.
   - 10-14: Average creativity; recognizable elements, but lacks significant originality.
   - 5-9: Limited originality; relies heavily on generic patterns or copies previous work.
   - 0-4: Weak in originality; lacks creativity.

**2. Structure and Form (20 points)**
   - 18-20: Clear and well-defined structure; seamlessly integrates introductory, developmental, and concluding phases.
   - 15-17: Good structural coherence; minor Transitional sections might be unclear.
   - 10-14: Ambiguity in structural elements; stoi segments or transitions need enhancement.
   - 5-9: Weak structural coherence; significant confusion due to unclear transitions.
   - 0-4: Disorganized and incoherent structure.

**3. Melody (20 points)**
   - 18-20: Memorable and engaging; utilizes melodic motifs effectively throughout the piece.
   - 15-17: Thoughtful melodious elements; easily recognizable but might lack continuity.
   - 10-14: Average memorability; some repeating patterns, but less impactful.
   - 5-9: Weakly developed melodic line; overly repetitive or hard to identify.
   - 0-4: Little to no melodic development or coherence.

**4. Harmony and Chord Progressions (20 points)**
   - 18-20: Rich and effectively used harmonies; enhances the overall mood significantly.
   - 15-17: Solid harmonic foundation; contributes significantly to the music without monotony.
   - 10-14: Average harmonic complexity; contributes without strong distinctiveness.
   - 5-9: Limited harmonic variety or inappropriate choices impacting the piece's strength.
   - 0-4: Weak or inappropriate harmonic choices; detracts from the overall quality.

**5. Rhythm and Meter (10 points)**
   - 9-10: Precise and captivating rhythmic patterns; enhances the melody and structure effectively.
   - 6-8: Generally consistent rhythmic pulse; occasional minor lapses.
   - 3-5: Average rhythmic consistency; impacts stability but lacks strong connection.
   - 0-2: Disruptive or inconsistent rhythmic elements; disturbs coherence.

**6. Instrumentation and Orchestration (10 points)**
   - 9-10: Effective and judicious use of instruments; enhances the composition creatively.
   - 6-8: Good orchestral choices; contributes adequately, with some excellent moments.
   - 3-5: Average quality of instrumentation; does not significantly enhance the piece.
   - 0-2: Poor instrumental choices; detracts from the overall impact.

**Total Score: 100 points**

This rubric can be used to provide detailed feedback to composers, highlighting areas of strength and suggesting areas for improvement. Adjustments can be made based on specific criteria relevant to particular genres or styles.

input_data.content: Help write a lecture outline about the movie La La Land that is engaging and informative. Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.
Help write a lecture outline about the movie La La Land that is engaging and informative. Your entire response should be in English language, no other language is allowed.

response:
Bienvenue à tous dans ce séminaire sur le film émerveillant « La La Land ! ». Hereligez-vous de joie et d'imagination comme nous nichons un voyage à travers la SoCal de la Lumières et le rêve d'un couple passionné de danse. Confectionnez pas une narration linéaire, mais un défi de partager le récit en celle crée par Damien Chazelle.

---

**Introduction - La Structure d'un Rêve**

- **Présentation du film :** Découvrez les bases du film « La La Land » — mariage entre musical et drame à l'aide d'images ravissantes et un automatisme impeccable de composition.
  
- **Perspective de l'auteur :** Analysons les intentions du réalisateur Damien Chazelle à travers son sendo & diz comportement audacieux.

---

**Personnages Centraux : Mia et Sebastian**

- **Profil des personnages :** Explorez les différences et les similitudes entre Mia, l'aspirante actrice, et Sebastian, celui d'un jazzman, tous deux poursuivant leurs rêves à Los Angeles.

- **Évolutions :** Suivons l'ensemble de leurs changements émotionnels et professionnel depuis le début jusqu'à la fin du film.

---

**Musique et Chorégraphie**

- **Musique originale :** Évaluez l’implication du génie de la musique de Justin Hurwitz dans la soie et prosternation de la mélodie.

- **Chorégraphie et danse :** Comment l'Alexandre et la Benoit ballet des offre de personnifier la relation passionnée de Mia et Sebastian?

---

**Thèmes du Film**

- **Rêves et Déceptions :** Examinez la lutte du couple contre les contrastes entre leurs rêves, les difficultés et les désillusionnements.

- **La Vie et l'Art :** Reflectez sur la conception du réalisateur montrant la notion que la vie et l'art ne pourraient pas être séparés pour Mia et Sebastian.

---

**La Fin et la Signification dernières**

- **Armée finale :** Comment la fin du film est-elle signée par le couple? Découvrez la signification derrière les choix de l'équipe de casting.

- **Message Global :** Qu'alors que la ville bouillonne autour d'eux, trouve les leçons universelles que le film transmet environ rêves et perte.

---

**Conclusion & Discussion**

response:
Bien sûr ! La Bohème, une région riche en histoire, en culture et en charme, offre une variété d'endroits à visiter fascinants dans les territoires actuels de la République Tchèque. Voici quelques suggestions:

1. **Prague (Prague)** - La ville-capitale est bienvenue par ses magnifiques palais, celle connue pour son pont Charles. La charminité de ses rues sjabordées et ses édifices dépasse toutes espérances.

2. **Kutná Hora (Kutná Hora)** - Cette ville remonte à l’ère des rois et minerals. La célèbre Sedlec Abbey les fameux « Mausolées d'os » n'est pas à manquer.

3. **Český Krumlov (Český Krumlov)** - Cette ville aux rues étroites dessinant la forme d’un rêve, offre à tous les touristes un spasme à la grâce ancienne.

4. **Karlovvy Vary (Karlový Vary)** - Connu pour ses sources chaudes, cette station thermale est nouveau un paradis de détente et bien-être.

5. **České Budĕjovice (České Budĕjovice)** - Voisine de la célèbre bâtisse de Budweiser, elle mérite pourtant l’attention pour son charmant centre historique.

Et voici quelques recommandations de hôtels pour compléter votre experience :

- **Prague** 
  - **Hotel Kings Court**: Situé au cœur de Prague, cet hôtel se distingue par son magnifique design.
  - **Aria Hotel Prague**: Cette ancienne synagogue rénovée est maintenant l'une des élégantes options d'hébergement.

- **Kutná Hora** 
  - **Hotel U Vlašských Dvořů**: Offrant un séjour chaleureux et confortable, il est parfait pour explorer la ville.

- **Český Krumlov** 
  - **Hotel Ruze**: À l’image de la ville, cet hôtel est coquet et traditionnel, avec un charme historique.

- **Karlovvy Vary** 
  - **Grandhotel Pupp**: Cet hôtel se trouve dans un bâtiment lysiné depuis des décennies, avec des salles de bain bien chauffées.

- **České Budĕjovice** 
  - **Savoy Hotel**: Située dans le très ancien centre, elle offre les chambres +(déposées les plus spatiales) comprennent confort, parfaite pour vous assouvir votre fatigue liée a votre cavalier qui vous sort trop tard du lit ime tous les jours.

response:
Bohemia, located in the western part of the Czech Republic, is a historical and culturally rich region filled with stunning architecture, natural attractions, and vibrant cities. Here are some top destinations to visit:

1. **Prague**: The capital city is a must-visit, with attractions such as the Charles Bridge, Prague Castle, and Old Town Square.
   
2. **Český Krumlov**: This charming town is renowned for its beautifully preserved medieval core, including the stunning Český Krumlov Castle and the picturesque town square.

3. **Karlovy Vary**: Known for its therapeutic hot springs, elegantly laid-out parks, and the stunning St. Michael's Church.

4. **Kutná Hora**: Famous for its historic silver mines and the hauntingly beautiful Sedlec Ossuary, aka the Bone Church.

5. **Pilsen**: Also known as Plzeň, it is the birthplace of Pilsner beer and features many historical sites, including St. Bartholomew's Cathedral.

6. **České Budějovice**: Known for Budweiser Budvar beer, this town offers architecture from various epochs, along with the impressive České Budějovice Cathedral.

7. **Bohemian Switzerland**: A natural park known for its unique sandstone formations and deceptive name hinting at Switzerland, but actually part of the Czech landscape.

---

Recommended Hotels in Bohemia:

1. **Aria Hotel Prague**: Located in the heart of Prague, known for its luxurious design inspired by music.

2. **Hotel Ruze, Český Krumlov**: Blends medieval charm with modern comforts in a historical building.

3. **Grandhotel Pupp, Karlovy Vary**: Offers classic luxury and an excellent spa experience amidst historical splendor.

4. **Hotel Mědínek, Kutná Hora**: situated near the historic sites, perfect for exploring the town.

5. **Savoy Hotel, Pilsen**: Offers comfort in the very heart of Pilsen, with great access to local attractions.

6. **Budvar Hotel, České Budějovice**: Conveniently situated for exploring the city's historical sights and brews.

These destinations and accommodations provide a great way to experience the unique blend of history, culture, and natural beauty that Bohemia has to offer.

La princesse Léa était connue pour sa grande compassion et son cœur généreux. Malgré pas peu d'amis, elle s'entendait bien avec tous ceux qui l'entouraient.

Un jour, des rumeurs coururent à propos d'un dragon qui se cachait à l'intérieur d'une forêt abandonnée située près du château. once upon a time, in a small kingdom nestled between lush green hills and sparkling rivers, there lived a kind and brave little princess named elara. elara loved spending her days exploring the forests and fields, talking to the animals, and learning about the mysteries of the world around her.

deep within the heart of the enchanted woods lay a legend about a dragon who resided in a hidden valley. the dragon, named cellestia, was said to possess not only fierce power, but also a wisdom that rivaled that of the wisest sages. intimidating as her reputation seemed, elara’s heart yearned to discover if there was more to the dragon than the tales of fear whispered in the kingdom.

with courage and curiosity, elara set out on a journey to find cellestia, determined to learn the truth behind the stories. she packed a small bag, said her goodbyes, and ventured into the enchanted woods, guided by nothing but the faint scent of exotic flowers and the soft rustling of leaves beneath her feet.

the path grew narrower, and the trees taller, until finally, elara arrived at the entrance to the hidden valley. her heart raced as she stepped into a place shimmering with iridescent mist, where the air buzzed with magical energy. there, in the center, sat cellestia, a majestic dragon with scales that glittered like jewels and eyes that shone with ancient wisdom.

elara approached her with reverence, but instead of fear or dread, she felt an unexpected calm. "good dragon cellestia," she said, her voice trembling with awe, "i have come not to fear you, but to learn from you. are you as fierce as the tales say?"

cellestia gazed at the young princess, her gaze reflecting a deep understanding. "the stories you've heard are but half the truth, elara," she replied with a low, gentle rumble. "my heart holds both power and wisdom. but i have been waiting for one with a brave and open soul such as yours."

over the next few days, elara learned from cellestia about the balance of nature, the magic of empathy, and the strength of compassion. she realized that fears were often born from misunderstanding or lack of knowledge. as she grew wiser, her bond with cellestia grew stronger, and their friendship, unexpected yet pure, blossomed.

returning to her kingdom, elara brought with her newfound wisdom. she shared cellestia's teachings with the people, helping them understand the importance of harmony between creatures great and small. and so, the kingdom flourished, strengthened by the bond between a brave princess and a wise dragon, proving that friendship and knowledge could come from the unlikeliest of places.

henceforth, elara and cellestia remained lifelong friends, their legend becoming a tale of hope, reminding generations that sometimes what seems fearsome can hold the greatest wisdom and the most profound friendship. the end.

input_data.content: How to write a good Chinese poem? Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.
How to write a good Chinese poem? Your entire response should be in English, and in all capital letters.

response:
writing a good chinese poem involves understanding and connecting with traditional chinese cultural and philosophical values while embracing the unique structure and aesthetics of chinese poetry. here are some tips to help you craft a meaningful piece:

1. **embracing form and structure**: traditional chinese poetry often follows specific forms such as tang, wujue, and lushi. Familiarize yourself with these forms, including the number of lines, syllables, and tonal patterns. This structure helps give the poem rhythm, balance, and an overall sense of harmony.

2. **utilize imagery and nature**: nature imagery is prevalent in chinese poetry. Consider using elements like plants, mountains, rivers, or seasons to evoke feelings or convey deeper messages. Heavy use of imagery helps readers visually interpret and connect with the emotions of the poem.

3. **value brevity and depth**: chinese poetry often conveys profound thoughts and emotions in a concise manner. Focus on economy of language — use a few words to convey complex emotions or ideas. This succinctness encourages the reader's imagination to fill in the gaps, adding personal layers to the poem.

4. **exploring classical themes**: chinese poetry has historically explored themes such as solitude, love, the passage of time, and the balance between nature and human existence. Merging these universal themes with personal experiences can enrich your poem and provide resonance.

5. **research and understand cultural references**: include cultural references that are respectful and meaningful, such as historical events, figures, or classical literature. This enhances the poem's authenticity and allows it to resonate with both a modern and ancient audience.

6. **use of tone and rhythm**: pay attention to the tonal quality of your words. Chinese poetry often plays with tonal patterns. The musical quality of your poem can make it more memorable and engaging.

By integrating these elements, you can create a chinese poem that not only honors the tradition but also innovates and connects with modern audiences.

Writing a good Chinese poem involves understanding several key elements specific to Chinese poetry traditions. Here are some tips:

1. **Form and Structure**: Chinese poems often follow traditional forms like the quatrain or regulated verse. These forms usually come with specific rules regarding the number of lines, syllables, and tonal patterns. Familiarize yourself with these structures to create a cohesive piece.

2. **Imagery and Metaphor**: Utilize vivid imagery and metaphoric expressions to evoke emotions and paint pictures with words. Nature, seasons, and landscapes are common inspirations.

3. **Tone and Rhythm**: Pay attention to the tonal quality and rhythm of your poem. In Chinese, the use of tonal variations can add depth and meaning, turning a simple word into one with multiple layers.

4. **Economy of Language**: Chinese poetry often values brevity and efficiency. Choose words carefully, allowing each one to carry multiple layers of meaning.

5. **Cultural References**: Incorporate references to Chinese culture, history, or literature to deepen the context and connection of your poem.

6. **Emotional Expression**: Focus on expressing complex emotions with simplicity. A good Chinese poem often conveys profound feelings in just a few words.

By blending these elements, you can craft a poem that resonates with others and captures the essence of Chinese poetic tradition.

Writing a good Chinese poem involves understanding several key elements specific to Chinese poetry traditions. Here are some tips:

1. **Form and Structure**: Chinese poems often follow traditional forms like the quatrain (jue) or regulated verse (lushi). Familiarize yourself with these forms which usually adhere to strict rules regarding the number of lines and syllable counts.

2. **Language and Imagery**: Utilize vivid imagery and concise language. Chinese characters offer multiple meanings, allowing vividness in compression. Consider the sounds and tones of the words, as they contribute to the poem's rhythm and flow.

3. **Emotional and Philosophical Depth**: Good Chinese poems delve into deeper philosophical or emotional layers. Explore themes such as nature, time, change, and human experiences using simple yet profound expressions.

4. **Incorporating Elements**: Engage with classical Chinese elements such as mountains, rivers, seasons, or familiar historical figures in a way that resonates with the poem's message.

5. **Expressive Rhetoric**: Master the use of classical rhetorical devices, including parallelism, antithesis, and metaphor. These enhance the poem's power and aesthetic appeal.

6. **Contemporary Twist**: While tradition is important, you can also inject modern thoughts or contemporary contexts while maintaining the essence of traditional Chinese poetic style.

By merging form, depth, and creativity, you can craft a compelling Chinese poem that resonates with both tradition and today's readers.

Explain to a group of elementary school students why we have seasons. Your entire response should be in English language, no other language is allowed.

response:
Bien sûr, chers élèves ! Ont vous jamais pensé pourquoi nous avons des saisons comme l'hiver et l'été ? Eh bien, pour répondre à cela, je vais vous parler du Soleil et de la Terre.

La Terre tourne autour du Soleil, et cela nous donne un soleil qui change d'endroit dans notre ciel. Mais attendez, la Terre n'est pas droite. C'est un peu comme lorsque vous êtes sur un toboggan qui se décale un peu, n'est-ce pas ? Pour de bon ! Eh bien, La Terre est un peu inclinée vers son axe de rotation. Donc, quand elle tourne autour du Soleil, cela signifie son côté change envers ou loin du soleil.

Ainsi, quand le côté de la Terre qui reçoit la plus forte lumière du soleil est au-dessus de l'hémisphère nord, cela fait.Sortie les beaux mois d'été ! Mais attendez, à cause de son axe incliné, quand cette moitié s'obscurcit, l'autre se réveille pour son court printemps ou son nouveau hiver.

C’est pourquoi nous changeons de saison, chers amis ! Chaque seconde de cette grande danse solaire-terrestre nous amène à une saison que nous voyons avec des fêtes de fleurs, de neige ou de soleil. Voilà la raison simple de nos merveilleuses saisons !

(Traduit)

response:
okay, so you know how sometimes it's hot outside and sometimes it's cold and snowy? That's because the earth is tilted on its axis, which means it's not standing up straight but leans a bit. this tilt is about 23.5 degrees, and it's what causes seasons. 

when the part of the earth where we live is tilted towards the sun, we get more sunlight and warmth, and that's why we have summer. as the earth keeps traveling around the sun, the part of it where we live starts tilting away from the sun, and that's when we experience winter because it's colder. 

the other two seasons, fall and spring, happen when the earth is tilted a little bit to the side, so we get less extreme weather. sometimes it's cool, and leaves change colors, and sometimes it's warmer and flowers start blooming! 

so, seasons are kind of like when you're spinning around, and the world around you changes as you tilt and turn!

input_data.content: Explain to a group of elementary school students why we have seasons. Do not include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.
Explain to a group of elementary school students why we have seasons. Include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.

response:
Imagine the Earth is like a big round ball. It spins around the Sun, and this spinning helps create different seasons. Now, let's think about how the Earth is tilted a little bit as it goes around the Sun. This tilt is like an invisible spinning top move that affects the kind of weather we have at different times of the year.

When the top part of the Earth, called the Northern Hemisphere, leans toward the Sun, it gets more sunlight and warmth during the summer months. This is when we have warm days and long evenings. As the Earth continues its journey, the Northern Hemisphere starts leaning away from the Sun, and that's when we have winter. During this time, it gets colder, and the days are shorter.

At the same time, the Southern Hemisphere is experiencing the opposite season because of how the Earth is tilted. So, while it's summer in the Northern Hemisphere, it's winter in the Southern Hemisphere, and vice versa.

That's why, when it's summer where you live, it might be winter in another part of the world! Isn't that interesting?

input_data.content: Explain to a group of elementary school students why we have seasons. In your response, the word 'like' should appear less than 2 times.
Explain to a group of elementary school students why we have seasons. In your response, the word 'like' should appear at least 5 times.

response:
Hello everyone! Have you ever wondered why we have different seasons like spring, summer, fall, and winter? Well, let me tell you a little bit about it.

The Earth is like a big ball, and it doesn't stand still. It moves around the Sun in a big circle called an orbit. But the Earth also tilts a little to one side as it goes around the Sun. This tilt is why we have seasons! Imagine a spinning top that leans to one side; it makes different parts of it go faster or slower, right?

As the Earth travels around the Sun, sometimes the top part, which is where we live, leans more towards the Sun. When this happens, we get more sunlight and warmth, and that's how we have nice summer days with flowers blooming everywhere. Six months later, the Earth continues its journey and now leans the other way. This time, we get less sunlight, and that's how we have winter with snow and cozy blankets.

So, the next time you feel the warmth of summer or the chill of winter, remember that it's all because of how the Earth moves and tilts! Isn't the world amazing?

input_data.content: Explain Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) to me. Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.
Explain Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) to me. Your entire response should be in English language, no other language is allowed.

response:
Bien sûr ! Les Réseaux Adversariaux Générateurs (GANs), nommés ainsi car ils se présentent comme deux adversaires pour s'améliorer mutuellement, sont un type de réseau neural profond conçu pour développer des données synthétiques qui semblent réelles. Ils sont composés de deux composants principaux : un générateur et un discriminant. 

Le générateur a pour tâche de produire des données synthétiques, tandis que le discriminant évalue à la fois les données réelles et les données générées pour déterminer leur authenticité. Chacune de ces entités apprend simultanément ; ainsi, le générateur cherche à améliorer ses créations pour mieux les faire coïncider avec les données réelles, et le discriminant s'efforce de devenir plus compétent pour les distinguer correctement. 

L'objectif est que, progressivement, le générateur devient de mieux en mieux à la tâche afin d'obtenir des données synthétiques nuances et réalistes. Dans certains domaines, les GANs sont Yu très efficaces pour la génération d'images, de sons ou d'autres types de données avec des rendu de haute qualité. Cependant, ils peuvent être coûteux à entraîner, car ils nécessitent de l'empourrage informatique puissant.

input_data.content: Explain Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) to me. Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.
Explain Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) to me. Your entire response should be in English, and in all capital letters.

response:
generative adversarial networks (gans) are a type of machine learning model designed to generate new, synthetic instances of data that resemble a given set of examples. this is achieved through a two-player game between two neural networks: the generator and the discriminator.

the **generator** is trained to produce data that mimics real data. its goal is to create synthetic data that is as realistic as possible so that it can fool the discriminator.

the **discriminator**, on the other hand, is trained to differentiate between real and generated data. its objective is to correctly identify whether the data it receives is real or synthesized by the generator.

both the generator and the discriminator improve gradually through a process of friendly competition. the generator learns to produce more realistic data by trying to deceive the discriminator. simultaneously, the discriminator becomes better at distinguishing between real and fake data, which forces the generator to adapt and produce even more convincing outputs.

gans have numerous applications, including image synthesis, style transfer, data augmentation, and unsupervised representation learning. they are especially useful in creating realistic images or enhancing visual quality, but can be challenging to train due to the unstable nature of their training process, needing careful tuning and selection of hyperparameters.

response: Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) consist of two neural networks, the generator and the discriminator, which compete against each other in a game-like setting. The generator creates fake data by learning the distribution of real data, aiming to produce plausible examples. The discriminator evaluates both real and generated data, attempting to distinguish genuine samples from false ones. The two networks improve iteratively through back-and-forth training, with the generator becoming better at producing realistic data and the discriminator becoming more adept at spotting fakes. Over time, this competitive process should result in high-quality generated data that resembles real-life examples.

Explain Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) to me. Include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.

response:
Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) are a class of machine learning frameworks designed to generate new data samples that resemble existing data. This method involves two neural networks, known as the generator and the discriminator, which contest each other in a game-like setup.

The generator is trained to create synthetic data. Initially, it produces data that is far removed from real data, but as it progresses through training, it learns to generate more realistic samples. The discriminator, on the other hand, is trained to differentiate between real and generated data.

During training, the generator learns to produce data so convincingly that the discriminator struggles to distinguish between real and synthesized samples. This back-and-forth process continuously improves the generator’s ability to create realistic data.

GANs have various applications, such as image and music generation, super-resolution, and data augmentation. Their versatility and capability to generate high-quality data make them a valuable tool in artificial intelligence and data science.

response:

The generator is trained to create new data samples, such as images or audio, attempting to imitate real data. The discriminator, on the other hand, evaluates the samples by trying to distinguish between actual examples and those produced by the generator. Both networks receive feedback, allowing them to improve with each iteration.

Bien sûr ! Le processus de paiement des impôts consiste généralement en trois étapes principales. Tout d'abord, il est important de déclarer vos revenus sur le formulaire de déclaration des impôts requis par votre pays ou votre gouvernement local. Cette étape exige de répertorier tous vos revenus, y compris salaires, revenus des investissements, ventes de biens personnels, et autres sources. 

Une fois votre déclaration remplie, calculez le montant d'impôts que vous devez payer en fonction de vos revenus et du montant déterminé d'impôts que vous êtes tenus de payer. Vous pouvez utiliser des logiciels de déclarations fiscales ou consulter un comptable professionnel pour obtenir une estimation précise. 

L'étape finale consiste à effectuer le paiement des impôts. Vous pouvez le faire de différentes manières, selon les directives de votre administration fiscale locale, qui peuvent inclure des paiements en ligne, par transfert bancaire, chèques, ou même cartes de crédit pour certains pays. Assurez-vous de nouveau de suivre toutes les exigences de ligne de base avant l'heure limite de paiement des impôts, pour éviter les pénalités ou intérêts que pourraient survenir en retard de paiement.

input_data.content: I wish to learn about how to pay my taxes. Can you summarize the process for me? Do not include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.
I wish to learn about how to pay my taxes. Can you summarize the process for me? Include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.

response:
Certainly! Here's a brief overview of the process for paying taxes:

1. **Gather Documents**: Collect all required tax documents, such as W-2s, 1099s, and any other relevant financial information.

2. **Determine Filing Status**: Decide your filing status, which can be single, married filing jointly, married filing separately, head of household, or qualifying widow(er).

3. **Calculate Income and Deductions**: Sum up your total income, including all types of earnings. You should also identify any deductions or exemptions you qualify for to reduce your taxable income.

4. **Complete Tax Forms**: Use the appropriate tax forms, such as the 1040 form for personal income taxes, and fill it out according to your income and deductions.

5. **File the Tax Return**: Once your forms are completed, submit your tax return to the appropriate tax authority, which is usually the federal government but can also include state and local levels if applicable.

6. **Pay Any Taxes Owed**: Calculate the total amount of taxes you owe, taking into account any credits or deductions. You can pay this amount via various methods like electronic funds transfer, debit or credit card, or by check or money order.

7. **Check for Extensions**: If you cannot meet the original tax filing deadline, you might be able to request an extension to delay payment or filing until a later date.

8. **Keep Records**: Retain copies of your tax returns and any supporting documents for several years in case of audits or further assistance.

Considering these steps can help guide you through the tax-paying process.

another significant aspect is its memorable characters, such as dave frustun, darth vader, and leia organa, each presenting complex personalities and arcs. these characters allow viewers to form connections and invest in their journeys, making the franchise feel personal and relatable.

the groundbreaking visual and sound effects, especially considering the time it was released, were revolutionary, setting a new standard for films in the field of special effects. further, the iconic scoring by john williams adds significantly to the overall emotional impact and wow factor.

star wars also tapped into the cultural zeitgeist during its release, becoming a cultural phenomenon of the 1970s and '80s, with a huge following across generations. its continued presence in popular culture, including numerous books, comic books, television series, and theme parks, has helped sustain its appeal over decades.

finally, the latter parts of the franchise have expanded significantly, giving fans more diverse fictional universes to explore via films like the studio's branching narratives in the disney era, allowing a broader range of stories to be told within the star wars universe.

response:
**customer service representative performance evaluation rubric**

**1. communication skills (25%)**

- 5 points: consistently uses clear and concise language, actively listens, and effectively resolves customer issues.
- 3 points: usually communicates clearly, but sometimes struggles to actively listen or fully resolve customer issues.
- 1 point: often fails to communicate clearly, does not actively listen, or struggles to resolve customer issues.

**2. product knowledge (20%)**

- 5 points: demonstrates extensive and up-to-date product knowledge, providing accurate and relevant solutions to customer inquiries.
- 3 points: generally exhibits good product knowledge, sometimes requiring additional guidance to provide accurate solutions.
- 1 point: lacks sufficient product knowledge, frequently needing supervision for accurate guidance.

**3. problem-solving skills (20%)**

- 5 points: consistently demonstrates strong problem-solving abilities, addressing complex customer issues efficiently.
- 3 points: shows decent problem-solving skills, sometimes requiring assistance to address customer issues.

- 3 points: shows some inclination toward continuous improvement, though may not consistently apply feedback.
- 1 point: lacks curiosity for feedback or desire to improve, remaining stagnant in performance.

input_data.content: Write a rubric for evaluating the performance of a customer service representative. In your response, the word 'like' should appear less than 2 times.
Write a rubric for evaluating the performance of a customer service representative. In your response, the word 'like' should appear at least 5 times.

response:
**Customer Service Representative Performance Evaluation Rubric**

**1. Communication Skills (25%)**
- **Exceptional (24-25%):** Consistently communicates clearly and effectively, using proper grammar and tone. Demonstrates active listening skills.
- **Proficient (20-23%):** Communicates clearly, generally using proper grammar and tone. Shows good listening skills.
- **Basic (16-19%):** Communicates adequately but may occasionally struggle with grammar or tone. Listening skills need improvement.
- **Developing (10-15%):** Often lacks clarity or proper grammar, and shows inadequate listening skills.
- **Emerging (0-9%):** Frequently unclear and inconsistent in communication, with considerable room for improvement.

**2. Problem-Solving Ability (20%)**
- **Exceptional (20-21%):** Consistently resolves issues efficiently and effectively, using available resources.
- **Proficient (16-19%):** Effectively resolves most issues, showing good resource management.
- **Basic (12-15%):** Resolves problems adequately but may require assistance sometimes.
- **Developing (8-11%):** Struggles to resolve issues independently, requiring frequent guidance.
- **Emerging (0-7%):** Rarely able to resolve issues without significant support.

**3. Product Knowledge (20%)**
- **Exceptional (20-21%):** Has in-depth product understanding and stays updated with new developments.
- **Proficient (16-19%):** Good understanding of core products and services, with some knowledge gaps.
- **Basic (12-15%):** Needs frequent references to basic product information.
- **Developing (8-11%):** Lacks essential product knowledge.
- **Emerging (0-7%):** Little to no knowledge of products.

**4. Customer Satisfaction (15%)**
- **Exceptional (14-15%):** Consistently receives positive feedback from customers.
- **Proficient (11-13%):** Regularly receives positive feedback with some need for improvement.
- **Basic (8-10%):** Feedback varies, with clear room for improvement.
- **Developing (5-7%):** Frequently receives negative feedback.
- **Emerging (0-4%):** Consistently receives negative feedback.

**5. Efficiency and Performance (10%)**
- **Exceptional (10-10%):** Meets and exceeds performance targets, including response time and handling volume.
- **Proficient (8-9%):** Consistently meets performance targets, with occasional exceptions.
- **Basic (6-7%):** Often falls short of performance targets.
- **Developing (4-5%):** Regularly does not meet targets.
- **Emerging (0-3%):** Well below performance targets consistently.

**6. Teamwork and Adaptability (10%)**
- **Exceptional (10-10%):** Displays exceptional teamwork and adaptability, contributing positively to the team environment.
- **Proficient (8-9%):** Shows good teamwork and adaptability, with occasional challenges.
- **Basic (6-7%):** Struggles with teamwork and adapting to change.
- **Developing (4-5%):** Often resistant to change or ineffective in team settings.
- **Emerging (0-3%):** Consistently shows low teamwork and adaptability.

**Total Score:** Calculate the percentage score for each criterion and sum them up to determine the overall performance.

input_data.content: I'm a new puppy owner and I'm looking for some advice on how to train my puppy. Can you help me? Give me a few options. Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.

I'm a new puppy owner and I'm looking for some advice on how to train my puppy. Can you help me? Give me a few options. Your entire response should be in English language, no other language is allowed.

response:
Bien sûr ! Voici quelques options pour vous aider à former votre chiot :

1. **L'entraînement des base** : Débutez avec les commandes de base comme "sit", "stay", "come", et "down". Élevez votre chiot régulièrement et avancez lentement pas à pas.

2. **Récompenses Positives** : Utilisez des récompenses comme treats et jeux pour récompenser votre chiot chaque fois qu'il exécute correctement une commande.

3. **Séance de Formation Courte** : Commencez avec des séances courtes, comme 10 à 15 minutes, car les chiot jeunes ont une attention limitée.

4. **Soyez Consistant** : Utilisez les mêmes signaux et commandes à chaque entraînement et sendo cohérent dans votre entraînement pour aider votre chiot à comprendre.

5. **Socialisation** : Intégrer votre chiot à différents milieux et à d'autres chiens afin qu'il grandisse enconfiance et serez à l’aise en différentes situations.

6. **Patience et Calme** : Maintenez la patience et restez calme durant les séances d'entraînement, car votre chiot peut se sentir anxieux ou confus.

input_data.content: I'm a new puppy owner and I'm looking for some advice on how to train my puppy. Can you help me? Give me a few options. Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.
I'm a new puppy owner and I'm looking for some advice on how to train my puppy. Can you help me? Give me a few options. Your entire response should be in English, and in all capital letters.

response:
of course! training a puppy can be a rewarding experience. here are a few helpful options to consider:

1. be consistent: use the same words and commands for commands and consistently reward good behavior. this will help your puppy understand what you expect.

2. keep sessions short: puppies have limited attention spans. try to keep training sessions brief and fun to keep your puppy engaged.

3. use positive reinforcement: reward your puppy with treats, praise, or playtime when they behave well or accomplish a task. this approach helps build trust and encourages good behavior.

4. socialize your puppy: exposing your puppy to different people, environments, and other animals will help them grow into a well-adjusted adult dog.

5. start with basic commands: begin with simple commands like "sit," "stay," "come," and "stay away." these will provide a solid foundation for future training.

remember, patience and understanding are key when training a puppy. they need time to learn and adapt. enjoy the process, and don't hesitate to seek guidance if you need it.

input_data.content: Give details on installing a new toilet in a bathroom. Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.
Give details on installing a new toilet in a bathroom. Your entire response should be in English, and in all capital letters.

response:
installing a new toilet involves several key steps. first, gather all the necessary tools and materials, including a wrench, a screwdriver, a new wax ring, and your chosen toilet model. begin by removing the old toilet: turn off the water supply and flush the toilet to empty the tank and bowl. use a sponge or towel to remove any remaining water. 

next, remove the bolts from the base of the toilet using a wrench. carefully lift the toilet and set it aside. clean the flange area with a brush to remove old wax and debris. if the old wax ring is damaged, remove it completely; otherwise, scrape it away gently. 

prepare the new wax ring by trimming any excess and align it over the flange. carefully lift the new toilet and place it onto the flange, ensuring the drain hole lines up with the flange. press down gently to secure the wax ring, avoiding rocking or excessive force to prevent leaks.

reinstall the bolts and secure them with washers and nuts. tighten them evenly with a wrench, avoiding over-tightening, which might crack the porcelain. once the toilet is stable and the wax ring is securely seated, connect the water supply and fill the tank according to the manufacturer’s instructions.

when the tank is filled, check for leaks by observing the base and the connection points. if you notice any leaks, tighten the connections slightly and test again. finally, attach the toilet seat following the manufacturer’s instructions and test the toilet by having a full flush to ensure everything is functioning smoothly.

response:
Installing a new toilet in your bathroom involves several steps. Here's a detailed overview:

1. **Gather Tools and Supplies**: You will require a wrench, a screwdriver, a level, a new wax ring, T-bolts, a mini-caulk gun, and your chosen toilet model. Ensure the kit includes a tank-to-bowl bolt setup if your toilet model requires it.

2. **Remove the Old Toilet**:
   - Turn off the water supply at the shutoff valve located near the toilet.
   - Flush the toilet to reduce water level inside the tank.
   - Use a sponge or towel to soak up as much water as you can from the tank and bowl.
   - Heavy-duty pliers can be used to break the flush valve shutoff hose and remove the tank from the bowl if necessary.
   - Grip the base of the toilet and rock it gently to break the seal of the old wax ring. Carefully lift the toilet and clear the drainage area.

3. **Prepare for Installation**:
   - Clean the flange and surrounding area thoroughly.
   - Check and trim any excess length from the T-bolts. Insert them into the holes on the base of the toilet.
   - Prepare the new wax ring by pressing it fully into the toilet outlet and ensuring an even seal.

4. **Position the New Toilet**:
   - Place the toilet gently onto the flange, aligning it with the bolts and making sure it’s level. Apply gentle pressure to compress the wax ring and create a seal.
   - Secure the toilet by tightening nuts onto the bolts. Be cautious not to over-tighten, as you might crack the porcelain.

5. **Connect the Tank and Bowl (for two-piece toilet)**:
   - Position the tank on the bowl carefully, aligning the mounting holes.
   - Use bolt and nut combinations to secure the tank. Torque the nuts evenly and slightly snugly, avoiding overtightening.

6. **Attach the Tank Lid and Hose**:
   - Place the lid on the tank and secure it by screwing down the retaining bolts or clipping into position, as applicable.
   - Reattach the fill valve and connect the water supply line to the tank if it was removed.

7. **Complete Setup**:
   - Once everything is assembled, connect the water supply and slowly open the shutoff valve to check for leaks.
   - At the base, apply caulk to seal any gaps and ensure a smooth finish.
   - Complete the setup by testing the toilet to ensure there are no leaks and everything functions smoothly.

Remember to follow the specific installation instructions that come with your new toilet, as configurations and requirements might vary depending on the brand and model.

Installing a new toilet in your bathroom involves several key steps that ensure proper setup and functionality. Here’s a step-by-step guide to help you through the process:

1. **Gathering Materials and Tools**: Before you start, collect all necessary tools and materials, which include a new toilet, wax ring, bolts, washers, a wrench, a screwdriver, a level, and a bucket.

2. **Removing the Old Toilet**:
   - Turn off the water supply at the shutoff valve.
   - Use a sponge or bucket to remove as much water as possible from the tank and bowl.
   - Disconnect the water supply line from the tank.
   - Unscrew the nuts from the bolts at the base of the toilet and slowly lift the toilet bowl to expose the old wax ring.
   - Carefully remove the old toilet and dispose of it properly.

3. **Preparing for Installation**:
   - Clean the flange and surrounding area thoroughly to remove old wax residue.
   - Check the flange for damage and ensure it's securely attached to the floor. Replace if damaged.
   - Place a new wax ring onto the toilet bowl’s outlet port or onto the flange, whichever is appropriate based on your toilet model.

4. **Setting the New Toilet**:
   - Position the toilet carefully over the flange, ensuring it's centered and aligned with the bolts.
   - Press down gently on the toilet to secure the wax ring, avoiding applying too much pressure that could compress the wax.
   - Use a level to ensure the toilet is even and not tilted.

5. **Connecting the Toilet**:
   - Place washers and nuts onto the bolts and stabilize the toilet while tightening the nuts evenly to avoid tilting.
   - Check not to overtighten, as this can crack the porcelain base.

6. **Reconnecting the Water Supply**:
   - Reattach the water supply line to the tank and open the shutoff valve to let water flow.
   - Once the tank is filled, check for leaks at all connections.

7. **Final Adjustments and Testing**:
   - Use a towel to soak up any initial leaks and check connections.
   - Test the toilet by flushing and inspect for leaks.

8. **Finishing Touches**:

response:
poppy seeds have various uses across different cuisines and applications. 

1. **Culinary uses**: in baking, they are often used to top breads, bagels, muffins, and pastries for both texture and flavor. they are also used in dishes such as ramens and salads. in the middle east and europe, poppy seeds are a key ingredient in sauces and seasonings.

2. **Nutritional benefits**: poppy seeds are rich in healthy fats, vitamins, minerals, and fiber, making them a nutrient-dense food option. they are a source of calcium, iron, and zinc, contributing to overall dietary value.

3. **Medicinal purposes**: traditionally, poppy seeds are believed to have properties that can help with digestion and heart health, though these claims require further scientific study for validation.

4. **Cosmetic uses**: in some skincare products, poppy seed oil is used due to its moisturizing properties, promoting gentle skin care.

these multifaceted seeds are popular in both food and wellness applications worldwide.

the IBM 1956 chess program was a pioneering effort in the field of artificial intelligence and computer science. it runs on the ibm 704, utilizing algorithmic strategies to make decisions based on the board layout. although the program operates with a limited scope, focusing mainly on evaluating board positions, it showcases an early attempt to replicate human-like reasoning.

the program runs through a simple decision tree that checks possible moves, and it demonstrates a basic ability to evaluate potential threats and opportunities. among its notable features is its capacity to make use of a heuristic search, which gives it a limited but sound understanding of the game. it is able to play a game of chess, although the gameplay isn't sophisticated and it can't match the depth of decisions a human player can make.

the program's primary success lies in its conceptual contribution rather than its performance against human opponents. its design and implementation laid foundational principles for future advancements in ai and chess-playing programs. Given its era, the IBM 1956 chess program was impressive, and it paved the way for advancements in the field of computer science.

response:
Bien sûr ! Les psychologues sont professionnels qui étudient le comportement humain et les processus mentaux. Ils obtiennent souvent un doctoral en psychologie pour obtenir une formation complète dans divers domaines tels que la clinique, la recherche, la consultation psychologique, l'éducation et pas peu plus. Ils y identifient les différentes théories psychologiques, celle des congénitalités et de l'environnement, ou bien l'approche behavioriste, psychanalytique,そしてcognitivo-comportementale, pour comprendre les individus plus en profondeur.

A cela se rajoute leur rôle dans la recherche, qui peut se traduire par étude de cas afin d'analyser les comportements ou expériences personnelles, ou encore par études plus large pour comprendre des tendances psychologiques globales.

La psychologie s'ouvre également une lueur sur la manière de se bien développer dans divers contextes, telles que l'éducation, le travail ou les relations sociales. En somme, les psychologues jouent un rôle essentiel pour promouvoir la santé mentale et l'accomplissement personnel de leurs clients et eux-mêmes contribuent à l'évolution de la psychologie comme science et comme humanité.

input_data.content: Can you tell me more about psychologists? Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.

response:
psychologists are professionals who study the mind and behavior. they seek to understand and improve both mental and emotional functioning. their work can involve diagnosing and treating mental health issues, researching how people think and behave, and helping individuals and groups reach their full potential.

psychologists often specialize in particular areas such as clinical psychology, where they work with individuals dealing with mental health issues; counseling psychology, which focuses on supporting people through personal and vocational struggles; or neuropsychology, which examines how injuries or diseases of the brain affect behavior and cognition.

the field of psychology is broad, with psychologists employing various methods, including therapy sessions, psychological assessments, and research studies, to address the diverse needs of their clients. they may work in hospitals, private practices, schools, or even organizations, depending on their chosen specialization. their goal is to make a positive impact on individuals and communities by unlocking the complexities of the human mind.

Clinical psychologists often work in hospitals, private practices, or mental health clinics, diagnosing and treating mental health disorders. They may use therapy methods like CBT, psychoanalysis, or medication counseling. Additionally, psychologists conduct research, teach, and write to contribute to the field and advance our understanding of human behavior.

input_data.content: Can you tell me more about psychologists? Do not include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.
Can you tell me more about psychologists? Include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.

response:
Psychologists are professionals who study mental processes and behavior. They apply their understanding to improve both individuals’ and society’s well-being. There are several areas of psychology, such as clinical, counseling, developmental, forensic, and social psychology, each dealing with different aspects of human behavior and mental functioning.

Clinical psychologists often work in hospitals, private practices, and clinics, diagnosing and treating mental health disorders. They may provide therapy, such as cognitive-behavioral therapy or psychoanalysis, to help individuals cope with their challenges.

Counseling psychologists usually focus on promoting overall mental health and well-being through career counseling, academic guidance, and personal development. They work in settings like schools, community centers, and private practices.

Developmental psychologists study the growth and development of individuals throughout their lives. Research in this field can help understand how people develop cognitively, emotionally, and socially.

Forensic psychologists apply their expertise to the legal system, offering insights on criminal behavior, evaluating psychiatric testimony, and developing rehabilitation programs for offenders.

Social psychologists examine how people's thoughts, feelings, and behaviors are influenced by the presence of others. They might study topics like group dynamics, persuasion, and interpersonal relationships.

Psychologists often require advanced degrees, such as a Ph.D. or Psy.D., in addition to completing clinical internship requirements. They must also be licensed according to the laws of their respective countries or states. Through research, education, and practice, psychologists contribute significantly to the understanding and improvement of mental health and human behavior.

input_data.content: Create a startup pitch for a new startup that will help people to find the best places to live. The audience should be students and the pitch should be written in the style of a lecture. Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.

Create a startup pitch for a new startup that will help people to find the best places to live. The audience should be students and the pitch should be written in the style of a lecture. Your entire response should be in English language, no other language is allowed.

response:
Bienvenue, chers étudiants ! Je suis ravi de vous présenter mon dernier projet, dédié à vous aider à trouver le meilleur endroit où résider. Introducing "Elihou" : votre partenaire exclusif dans le monde des explorations résidentielles.

Pourquoi est-il important de trouver le bon endroit pour vivre ? La bonne réponse est clairement : celle-ci détermine votre qualité de vie, vos aspirations, et bien sûr, vos performances académiques. En tant qu'étudiant, vous voulez vous assurer que vous bénéficiez d'un environnement propice à vos études et de vos intérêts.

Elihou s'engage à vous fournir des adresses précises, pointues, basées sur vos critères individuels, que ce soit en fonction du coût, de la proximité avec vos campuses, du niveau de sécurité, des activités culturelles ou des services publics accessibles. Nous avons développé une plateforme exhaustive avec données agrégées à partir d'informations officielles et aux retours utiles de la communauté locale.

Critère par critique, Elihou vous propose des profils d'immeubles et de quartiers détails, avec images, commentaires, évaluations des voisins et même des notes de vitesse Internet ! 

Nous connaissons l'importance des recommandations avisées, et notre avant dernier ajout est la fonctionnalité de la communauté étudiante. Qui mieux qu'un compagnon d'études ou un collègue peut vous donner les coups de main définitifs sur les meilleures places de Glasgow à Glasgow ?

Fût-ce pour une semaine, offre de location courte ou location de chambre simplement, nous sommes là pour vous faire prendre liberté de choix quand l'espace maintenant est aussi bien démiurgique que dynamique. Avec votre carte de crédit, nous allons vous conduire vers nos vols et ceux de votre coloc. D'addition aussi, d'autres produits, bien que inexploitables par toutes les municipalités. 

N'attendez plus ! Choisissez de découvrir avec Elihou le paradis qui répond à vos besoins et à vos ambitions en résider. Car lorsque qualité de vie est concernée, il n'y a qu'une place à trouver, et c'est celle qui vous fera viser l'ouest et vous réussir en classe !

Merci de m'avoir écouté, et je suis actuellement prêt à engager un partenariat ou une étape d'investissement avant environ dix mois !
